EmailTemplate.name: HAPP/MPP Countersigned Notice for Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: HAPP/MPP countersigned notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer, <?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Thank you for signing and returning your Honeywell Avionics/Mechanical Protection Program (HAPP/MPP) service agreement.
Attached please find the Honeywell countersigned copy for your records.
Thank you for your participation in our HAPP/MPP Program and we look forward to providing you continued HAPP/MPP service. If you have any questions, please direct your request to HAPP-sales@honeywell.com or call 1-800-601-3099/1-602-365-3099.
Regards,
{!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__r.Case__c.OwnerFirstName}
HAPP Administration
HAPP-sales@honeywell.com
